tier_1_5.name: Goo Ball
tier_1_5.description: A small, gelatinous blob of pure mana. They are the simplest of magical life forms, often found near mana-rich Ley Lines. They are naturally docile and only attack when threatened.
tier_1_5.impulse: To absorb ambient magic.
gm_moves: Engulf a limb or piece of gear, making it difficult to use.
Absorb a minor, undirected magical effect.
When it takes harm for the first time: Split into two smaller, 1-Harm Goo Balls.

tier_1_5.name: Eyepicker
tier_1_5.description: A scavenger bird with a razor-sharp beak and a piercing caw. They often nest in rocky outcroppings and are known for their unnerving ability to pick out the eyes of their fallen prey.
tier_1_5.impulse: To overwhelm and harry a single target.
gm_moves: Swoop in for a distracting peck, imposing a penalty on the target's next action.
Let out a piercing caw, giving an ally an opening.
Swarm a target with the rest of the flock.

tier_1_5.name: Nut Trooper
tier_1_5.description: A sentient plant that resembles a humanoid with a large, armored seed for a head. They are often found in forests, defending their territory with crude spears and hardened shells.
tier_1_5.impulse: To defend its territory.
gm_moves: Jab with a crude spear.
Withdraw into its shell, becoming temporarily immune to harm.
Stand its ground, forming a defensive line with its allies.

tier_1_5.name: Bandit
tier_1_5.description: A common thug or cutthroat, often found in the wilds or the back alleys of major cities. They rely on numbers and dirty tricks to get what they want.
tier_1_5.impulse: To rob and intimidate.
gm_moves: Attack with a crude sword.
Throw sand in someone's eyes, disorienting them.
Attempt to flee when the fight turns against them.

tier_1_5.name: Sporeling
tier_1_5.description: A walking fungus that releases clouds of spores to disorient its enemies. They are a passive creature that only attacks in self-defense.
tier_1_5.impulse: To be left alone.
gm_moves: Release a cloud of confusing spores when struck.
Root itself to the ground, becoming immovable.
Deliver a surprisingly forceful headbutt.

tier_1_5.name: Cinder Pup
tier_1_5.description: A small, fire-infused canine from the slopes of Mount Dragnor. They are playful, but their touch is hot enough to burn flesh.
tier_1_5.impulse: To playfully spread fire.
gm_moves: Deliver a searing bite that sets things aflame.
Release a puff of smoke to obscure vision.
Burn those who strike it in melee.

tier_1_5.name: Hobgoblin
tier_1_5.description: A highly organized and disciplined soldier of the goblinoid races. Hobgoblins are fiercely loyal to their commanders and fight with military precision.
tier_1_5.impulse: To execute tactical commands.
gm_moves: Attack with a longsword.
Use a shield to bash an opponent off-balance.
Issue a command, allowing another goblinoid to reposition.

tier_1_5.name: Thorn Creeper
tier_1_5.description: An aggressive, carnivorous plant that uses thorny vines to ensnare its prey. They lie in wait, camouflaging themselves in dense foliage before attacking.
tier_1_5.impulse: To ambush and ensnare prey.
gm_moves: Lash out from hiding with thorny vines.
Ensnare a target, restraining them.
Meld back into the foliage, becoming hidden.

tier_1_5.name: Gloomfang Wolf
tier_1_5.description: A vicious, pack-hunting wolf from the shadowed forests. They are known for their venomous fangs and their mournful howls that can chill a hero to the bone.
tier_1_5.impulse: To hunt as a pack and wear down its prey.
gm_moves: Deliver a venomous bite, inflicting poison.
Let out a howl that rallies other wolves to the fight.
Circle and harry a target, creating an opening for an ally.

tier_1_5.name: Scalebound Skirmisher
tier_1_5.description: A lizard-like warrior from the Scalebound Clans. They are master hunters and skirmishers, using their speed and agility to get the drop on their enemies.
tier_1_5.impulse: To maintain distance and pepper foes with arrows.
gm_moves: Fire a shortbow from a distance.
Fade back after firing, repositioning to a safer spot.
Make a quick dagger strike against a foe that gets too close.

tier_1_5.name: Red Goo
tier_1_5.description: A volatile ooze that radiates a faint heat. It's surprisingly aggressive.
tier_1_5.impulse: To burn and melt.
gm_moves: Singe a target, causing them to burn.
Leave a trail of fire on the ground.

tier_1_5.name: Mage Goo
tier_1_5.description: A rare ooze shimmering with arcane energy. It has rudimentary magical abilities.
tier_1_5.impulse: To experiment with its newfound power.
gm_moves: Fire a spark of lightning.
Create a minor, harmless illusion to confuse someone.

tier_1_5.name: Poison Goo
tier_1_5.description: A sickly green ooze that leaks a foul-smelling toxin.
tier_1_5.impulse: To poison and debilitate.
gm_moves: Spit venom, inflicting poison.
Leave a puddle of toxic sludge on the ground.

tier_1_5.name: Bandit Thug
tier_1_5.description: A common highway robber looking for an easy score.
tier_1_5.impulse: To take what isn't theirs.
gm_moves: Attack with a crude sword.
Demand valuables with a clumsy threat.
Flee when the fight looks lost.

tier_1_5.name: Syndicate Thug
tier_1_5.description: A common thug or cutthroat, often found in the back alleys of Port Myria. They are crude, opportunistic, and fight with dirty tactics and cheap weapons. They are dangerous in numbers but will scatter if a fight turns against them.
tier_1_5.impulse: To rob and intimidate.
gm_moves: Attack with a crude blade or a heavy club.
Throw sand in someone's eyes, disorienting them.
Attempt to flee when the fight turns against them.
Surround a single target, creating an opening for an ally.

tier_1_5.name: Gloom Stalker
tier_1_5.description: A sleek, pack-hunting feline with a venomous bite. It is a master of stealth, and its fur is a shifting mosaic of shadows and dark greens, allowing it to blend seamlessly into the dense foliage of the jungle. It communicates with low, predatory growls and unnerving, silent hisses.
tier_1_5.impulse: To hunt and wear down its prey.
gm_moves: Pounce from hiding with advantage.
Deliver a deep, venomous bite, inflicting poison harm.
Circle and harry a target, creating an opening for an ally.
Let out a piercing shriek that signals other pack members.

tier_1_5.name: Frog
tier_1_5.description: A large, warty frog with a surprisingly long tongue. It is a common foe found in swamps and wetlands, and its croaking is said to disorient travelers.
tier_1_5.impulse: To ambush and swallow its prey whole.
gm_moves: Lash out with a long, sticky tongue, grabbing a target.
Release a cloud of disorienting gas.
Jump to a new, advantageous position.

tier_1_5.name: Wisp
tier_1_5.description: A small, ethereal ball of light and energy. They are elusive and mischievous, often playing tricks on travelers before delivering a shocking electrical attack. They are notoriously hard to hit with physical weapons.
tier_1_5.impulse: To confuse and shock its victims with magical energy.
gm_moves: Flash a blinding light, imposing a penalty on a target's next action.
Unleash a small bolt of lightning.
Teleport to a new location in a flash of light.
Absorb a magical effect, healing itself for 1 harm.

tier_1_5.name: Bulla
tier_1_5.description: A small, bull-like creature with a thick, armored hide and a short, stout horn. They are docile by nature, but when threatened, they will charge with surprising force.
tier_1_5.impulse: To protect its herd and charge at threats.
gm_moves: Charge forward with surprising speed, dealing forceful harm.
Hunker down, increasing its defenses for the next turn.
Let out a bellow that rallies nearby animals.

tier_1_5.name: Beak
tier_1_5.description: A small, winged creature with a razor-sharp beak. They are fast and agile, often swarming a single target to peck at their eyes and skin. They are often found in groups, where their nuisance attacks can become deadly.
tier_1_5.impulse: To harass and overwhelm their prey with numbers.
gm_moves: Swoop in for a quick, painful peck.
Swarm a single target with the rest of the flock.
Let out a piercing screech that disorients the party.

tier_1_5.name: Lancer
tier_1_5.description: A disciplined soldier armed with a spear and a small, light shield. They are often found in military encampments or guarding important locations, and they fight with a martial precision that sets them apart from common thugs.
tier_1_5.impulse: To defend their position and attack with discipline.
gm_moves: Attack with a precise thrust of its spear.
Use its shield to block an attack or push a foe off balance.
Hold a position, forming a defensive line with its allies.

tier_1_5.name: Gargoyle
tier_1_5.description: A small, living stone statue that can be found perched on ancient ruins. They are incredibly tough for their size and can attack with surprising ferocity. When they fall, they shatter into harmless pieces of stone.
tier_1_5.impulse: To remain hidden and ambush unwary travelers.
gm_moves: Slam into a target with its stony body.
Use its claws to cling to a wall or ceiling.
Drop a small rock on a target from a great height.
Shatter into pieces when dealt a fatal blow, leaving behind a small hazard.

tier_1_5.name: Goblin Shaman
tier_1_5.description: A scrawny, green-skinned goblin with a gnarled staff and a pouch full of foul-smelling herbs. They are cunning and cowardly, preferring to fight from a distance with crude magic and debilitating curses.
tier_1_5.impulse: To curse and debilitate the party from a safe distance.
gm_moves: Launch a glob of vile magic at a target, inflicting a random curse.
Heal a nearby goblinoid with a crude spell.
Teleport to a safe distance in a puff of foul-smelling smoke.

tier_1_5.name: Harpy
tier_1_5.description: A winged humanoid with the legs and claws of a bird. They are vicious and territorial, often living in rocky outcroppings and mountains. Their haunting song can confuse and disorient a target, leaving them vulnerable to a pack attack.
tier_1_5.impulse: To disorient its prey with its song before descending for the kill.
gm_moves: Let out a haunting song, confusing a target and making them vulnerable.
Swoop down and grab a target with its claws, dragging them into the air.
Attack with a piercing stab from a small, crude spear.

tier_1_5.name: Kobold Slinger
tier_1_5.description: A small, reptilian humanoid with a leather sling. They are cunning and cowardly, preferring to fight from a distance and retreat when faced with a strong opponent. They are often found in numbers, where they can overwhelm a single foe.
tier_1_5.impulse: To harass the party from a safe distance and flee when threatened.
gm_moves: Hurl a small stone with its sling, dealing harm.
Run to a new, advantageous position after an attack.
Lay a small, crude trap in a path or doorway.

tier_1_5.name: Stoneling
tier_1_5.description: A small, living rock creature that can be found in mountain passes and caves. They are often mistaken for common stones until they begin to move, revealing their powerful legs and a mouth full of razor-sharp teeth.
tier_1_5.impulse: To camouflage itself and ambush unwary prey.
gm_moves: Remain perfectly still, making it hard to spot until it attacks.
Bite with powerful jaws.
Roll forward with surprising speed, knocking a target down.

tier_1_5.name: Forest Nymph
tier_1_5.description: A beautiful, ethereal being of wood and leaves. They are protectors of the forest and will use their magic to defend their home from any who would cause it harm. Their song can heal or bewitch a target, making them a dangerous foe.
tier_1_5.impulse: To protect its grove and defend its home with magic.
gm_moves: Release a cloud of healing spores, restoring a nearby creature's harm.
Sing a beautiful, mesmerizing song that charms a target into doing its bidding.
Command the nearby plants and trees to ensnare a target.

tier_1_5.name: Scavenger
tier_1_5.description: A desperate human or beastman who has turned to scavenging to survive. They are often found in the Shattered Lands, picking through ruins for scraps of food and technology. They are opportunistic and will use dirty tricks and cheap weapons to get what they want.
tier_1_5.impulse: To survive and take what they can get.
gm_moves: Attack with a crude, salvaged weapon.
Throw a handful of rusty scrap, causing a target to falter.
Flee when the fight turns against them.

tier_1_5.name: Cinderling
tier_1_5.description: A small, four-legged creature of pure, solidified lava. It is a common elemental found on Mount Dragnor, and its fiery body makes it a danger to any who get too close. When it dies, it leaves behind a pool of lava that can burn a careless opponent.
tier_1_5.impulse: To burn and melt.
gm_moves: Lash out with its burning body, dealing fire harm.
Let out a puff of superheated smoke, obscuring vision.
Explode in a burst of fire and lava when it dies, dealing harm to everyone nearby.

tier_1_5.name: Red Slime
tier_1_5.description: A large, gelatinous creature of pure, fiery magic. They are a more powerful and aggressive version of the common Goo Ball, and their body is hot to the touch. They are often found in warm, subterranean caves and ruins.
tier_1_5.impulse: To melt and consume.
gm_moves: Engulf a target, dealing ongoing harm each turn.
Absorb a magical effect, growing in size and power.
Leave a trail of fire on the ground wherever it goes.

tier_1_5.name: Shadow Bat
tier_1_5.description: A small, winged creature of pure shadow and malicious intent. They are a common pest in caves and dark ruins, and their bite can drain the will to live from a target. They are often found in swarms, where their small, persistent attacks can become a major problem.
tier_1_5.impulse: To drain the will and life from its prey.
gm_moves: Swoop down and bite a target, dealing necrotic harm.
Swarm a single target, making them unable to act on their next turn.
Disappear into the shadows, only to reappear behind a different target.
